blume

Class Win32

  • java.lang.Object
    • blume.Win32

  • public class Win32
extends java.lang.Object
    Class built on JNA objects for Win32 console coloring.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Win32.CONSOLE_SCREEN_BUFFER_INFO
      Java version of the native Win32 CONSOLE_SCREEN_BUFFER_INFO struct.
      static class  Win32.COORD
      Simple console coordinate points class.
      static interface  Win32.Kernel32
      Java interface for Win32's kernel32 library (JNA).
      static class  Win32.SMALL_RECT
      Simple rectangle class.

    • Field Summary

      Standard output handle for Win32.

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Win32.CONSOLE_SCREEN_BUFFER_INFO getConsoleInfo()
      Get the current CONSOLE_SCREEN_BUFFER_INFO object.
      static void initializeConsole()
      Initialize the CONSOLE_SCREEN_BUFFER_INFO object with native console data.
      static void resetConsole()
      Resets the console with standard console attributes.
      static void setColor(short[] hexes)
      Sets the Windows console text attributes with the chosen hexadecimal (short) values.

      Sets the Windows console text attributes with the chosen color modifiers.
